entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:43 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
